snippet.title: Legend of Krannia: Cursed Fate ( Game Trailer )
snippet.description:
Ready to start a new Adventure?

Legend of Krannia is a top-down fantasy game with deck building elements. Vahn who is betrayed by his fellow soldiers and falls in battle was given another chance and finds himself back in Greentown having to start new, he must build his strength and stop the darkness that plagues the kingdom.

_____________________________
------- Steam Page ---------
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1458340/Legend_of_Krannia_Cursed_Fate/
------- Itch.io Page ----------
